dc_title_s: A new and accurate map of the Empire of the Great Mogul, together with India on both sides the Ganges and the adjacent countries
dc_description_s: Map of India and Indochina with relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: London. Plate 43 from: A complete atlas, or, Distinct view of the known world / by Emanuel Bowen. London : Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson [and others], 1752. Dimensions: 35 x 41 centimeters
dc_publisher_s: Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson et al.
